movie.title: Au Hasard Balthazar
movie.description_intro: This is the story of a donkey and the somewhat difficult life it leads. During a summer holiday, the baby donkey is a child's pet but when they return home, it begins it's life of misery. It works as a farm animal, pulling a delivery cart and working as any manner as various owners require of it. Meanwhile, the young girl who first acquired Balthazar as a pet grows up, only to be badly treated herself by an indifferent and selfish boyfriend.
movie.description_full: This is the story of a donkey and the somewhat difficult life it leads. During a summer holiday, the baby donkey is a child's pet but when they return home, it begins it's life of misery. It works as a farm animal, pulling a delivery cart and working as any manner as various owners require of it. Meanwhile, the young girl who first acquired Balthazar as a pet grows up, only to be badly treated herself by an indifferent and selfish boyfriend.

movies.title: A Haunting at Silver Falls: The Return
movies.title_english: A Haunting at Silver Falls: The Return
movies.title_long: A Haunting at Silver Falls: The Return (2019)
movies.summary: Several years after a deadly struggle with her serial killer aunt, Jordan works to escape her troubled history. But when her aunt's revenge-seeking specter surfaces to join forces with a deranged convict, Jordan must return to the haunted town of Silver Falls for a final showdown with the ghosts of her past.
movies.description_full: Several years after a deadly struggle with her serial killer aunt, Jordan works to escape her troubled history. But when her aunt's revenge-seeking specter surfaces to join forces with a deranged convict, Jordan must return to the haunted town of Silver Falls for a final showdown with the ghosts of her past.

movies.title: 2020 Billboard Music Awards
movies.summary: The 2020 BILLBOARD MUSIC AWARDS is a music ceremony that honors artists, albums and songs that dominated to Billboard charts over the past year, and features celebrity presenters and live musical performances.
movies.description_full: The 2020 BILLBOARD MUSIC AWARDS is a music ceremony that honors artists, albums and songs that dominated to Billboard charts over the past year, and features celebrity presenters and live musical performances.

movies.title: The Annihilators
movies.summary: Upon his return from Vietnam, an ex-soldier finds his neighborhood has deteriorated badly, and is being terrorized by a vicious street gang. He calls some of his GI buddies, and together they hatch a plan to get rid of the gang.
movies.description_full: Upon his return from Vietnam, an ex-soldier finds his neighborhood has deteriorated badly, and is being terrorized by a vicious street gang. He calls some of his GI buddies, and together they hatch a plan to get rid of the gang.

movies.title: Hawaii
movies.summary: Reverend Abner Hale (Max Von Sydow), a rigid and humorless New England missionary, marries the beautiful Jerusha Bromley (Dame Julie Andrews) and takes her to the exotic island kingdom of Hawaii, intent on converting the natives. But the clash between the two cultures is too great and instead of understanding, there comes tragedy.
